_sText:
Biodome - Hostage Rescue
Made by Foofinoo


While a terrorist group has invaded the Black Mesa Research Facility to steal their new energy weapons, something strange seems to have happened in this place...

Most of the inhabitants appear to be missing, as if everyone had suddenly decided to leave overnight. In addition, military equipment and traces of combat are scattered throughout the laboratories. On top of that, strange creatures seem to prowl in these corridors...

Despite all that, the terrorists were still able to get their hands on several scientists. A team of counter-terrorists was sent to rescue them.


After over ten months of development (okay, I did little to nothing for the last two months), here it is: the remake of my own map CS_Biodome!
As always, it has been really fun to build. Perhaps a bit long, but really cool to see the map grow more and more during the first few months.

Yet, I have to admit I was expecting a bit more feedback on the WIP page. At least the few comments were positive...
If you're interested in the map development, you can check that page to find quite a lot of information about it!

As you can see, all the custom content is coming from Black Mesa.
That's right, why not take advantage of the marvellous work from the Crowbar Collective?
Of course, I still had a lot to do to fix, adapt and edit the different assets so that everything fits well in the level.

About the map itself, it is actually a remake of an old map of mine that was originally released for Counter-Strike 1.6 in 2016.
Needless to say, this new version greatly improves the layout, the visuals and more generally every aspect of it.
To put it simply: everything is bigger, larger, greater and in the end (hopefully), better.
I have kept the main ideas I was able to develop on the original map while adding a huge amount of detail and paths as well as some little easter eggs.

Here are a few interesting numbers about the map:
  • A file weight of over 620 MB! (yeah it's quite heavy, but it's because there is a lot of custom stuff, as you will see)
  • About 5830 brushes and 34720 faces!
  • Over 250 custom models!
  • More than 200 custom textures!
  • An estimated making time of: far too much!

Anyway, I really hope you will have fun and enjoy the map!


Foofinoo
August 16, 2021
